snippet: The American soldier charged in the shooting deaths of 17 Afghan villagers will not participate in an Army review to determine his mental state, his lawyer said Friday.
abstract: Staff Sgt Robert Bales, the American soldier charged in the shooting deaths of 17 Afghan villagers, will not participate in an Army review to determine his mental state.
lead_paragraph: The American soldier charged in the shooting deaths of 17 Afghan villagers will not participate in an Army review to determine his mental state, his lawyer said Friday.

headline.main: Washington: Soldier Won’t Comply With Sanity Review After Massacre
headline.print_headline: Washington: Soldier Won’t Comply With Sanity Review After Massacre
